channel.title: Quick Question about Clients, and My Server
channel.description: This is just a quick question, "If I have all the files and everything I need for my server, and I never ran the server, Can I still make a client, and run that?

item.title: Quick Question about Clients, and My Server
item.dc:creator: @Project_Diabolus Project Diabolus
item.description:
@Project_Diabolus wrote:

well, it would be easier to download a source that comes with a client, otherwise you will have to do about 4 hours of item numbering, npc numbering, object numbering, and so on

Read full topic
item.source: Quick Question about Clients, and My Server
